name: John Andy
description: I`m 5′ 11″ 180 lbs with a fit build , mentally stable, physically fit, I’m caring, honest, a good listener, God Fearing, and a positive person. I am real easy person to talk to and a loving man. I enjoy playing sax which i do often at my leisure time. I like going to the movies,or watching movies in my room or Cabin, I like swimming, listening to music and dance to any kind of music, I sing, sailing, going bowling and also a good cook. I am a family oriented person, love children and there is more
